entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
